instructions.title: Aim Carefully
instructions.description: Look for clusters where at least two candies of the same type are already waiting. These are your prime targets for creating trios.
instructions.tip: Take your time to plan your shots - precision is key!

instructions.title: Throw with Precision
instructions.description: Click and drag to aim your candy, then release to throw. The longer you hold, the more power you'll have, but accuracy is crucial.
instructions.tip: Practice makes perfect - start with easy targets!

instructions.title: Create Perfect Trios
instructions.description: Only groups of exactly three matching candies will score points and create satisfying explosions. Four or more won't count!
instructions.tip: Remember: exactly three candies, no more, no less!

instructions.title: Chain Reactions
instructions.description: When candies explode, they clear space for new ones. Use this to your advantage to create multiple combos in a single turn.
instructions.tip: Look for opportunities to trigger chain reactions!

instructions.title: Score Points
instructions.description: Each successful trio earns you points. The more strategic your moves, the higher your score will be.
instructions.tip: Try to clear multiple trios in one turn for bonus points!

instructions.title: Keep Playing
instructions.description: The game continues until you can't make any more moves. Challenge yourself to beat your high score!
instructions.tip: Don't give up - every game is a new opportunity!
